Methodologies

<a href="../methodologies/node.js-versus-next.js-a-react-approach.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-42olwf r-rs99b7 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-15ysp7h r-ymttw5 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>

Node.js versus Next.js - A React Approach

Interview

<a href="https://bryan-guner.gitbook.io/my-docs/v/mynotes/interview/question-set-1" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-42olwf r-rs99b7 r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-15ysp7h r-ymttw5 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>

Question Set #1:

<a href="https://www.gitbook.com/?utm_source=content&amp;utm_medium=trademark&amp;utm_campaign=-MWyt4j29ReMyImgcaO7" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1uwl36a r-z2wwpe r-1rasi3h r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-1fdo3w0 r-1mnahxq r-ymttw5 r-5njf8e r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-eu3ka r-1aockid" /></a>

Powered By <span class="css-901oao css-16my406 r-b88u0q">GitBook</span>

Composition vs Inheritance

<span key="da76a269deb0481ab3ab7fa7d1c5fb2d"><span offset-key="da76a269deb0481ab3ab7fa7d1c5fb2d:0">React has a powerful composition model, and we recommend using composition instead of inheritance to reuse code between components.</span></span>

<span key="19cbe0706f1044f4b2d6794105c7f4db"><span offset-key="19cbe0706f1044f4b2d6794105c7f4db:0">In this section, we will consider a few problems where developers new to React often reach for inheritance, and show how we can solve them with composition.</span></span>

# 

<span key="6fbeeebf8fd4494682e2558d54be6cb6"><span offset-key="6fbeeebf8fd4494682e2558d54be6cb6:0">Containment</span></span>

<span key="94461bcb913c4a4295d946190556ecb6"><span offset-key="94461bcb913c4a4295d946190556ecb6:0">Some components don’t know their children ahead of time. This is especially common for components like </span>`Sidebar`<span offset-key="94461bcb913c4a4295d946190556ecb6:2"> or </span>`Dialog`<span offset-key="94461bcb913c4a4295d946190556ecb6:4"> that represent generic “boxes”.</span></span>

<span key="39353f4eb15a4bb0a21805cee77328e5"><span offset-key="39353f4eb15a4bb0a21805cee77328e5:0">We recommend that such components use the special </span>`children`<span offset-key="39353f4eb15a4bb0a21805cee77328e5:2"> prop to pass children elements directly into their output:</span></span>

1

<span key="ebe6a1348b0244bcb1d50954054afb6c"><span offset-key="ebe6a1348b0244bcb1d50954054afb6c:0">function FancyBorder(props) {</span></span>

2

<span key="f31e8093ec3f4d18b7ec5d1c04eba94e"><span offset-key="f31e8093ec3f4d18b7ec5d1c04eba94e:0"> return (</span></span>

3

<span key="a07d638d2ecd4265bea30307a08920bb"><span offset-key="a07d638d2ecd4265bea30307a08920bb:0"> &lt;div className={'FancyBorder FancyBorder-' + props.color}></span></span>

4

<span key="e84a1b879c49499188b98fbe27f44d27"><span offset-key="e84a1b879c49499188b98fbe27f44d27:0"> {props.children} &lt;/div></span></span>

5

<span key="e01fb06ec3a7420282310c9e0759b38b"><span offset-key="e01fb06ec3a7420282310c9e0759b38b:0"> );</span></span>

6

<span key="ca3704cc1b2340aa9fee072f598b9da0"><span offset-key="ca3704cc1b2340aa9fee072f598b9da0:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

<span key="0b9b0abf6aa94f7dbcf541e3426fa31e"><span offset-key="0b9b0abf6aa94f7dbcf541e3426fa31e:0">This lets other components pass arbitrary children to them by nesting the JSX:</span></span>

1

<span key="24726c89d9d9436a8fc0a4e5b270eac3"><span offset-key="24726c89d9d9436a8fc0a4e5b270eac3:0">function WelcomeDialog() {</span></span>

2

<span key="ff838de92c774abeb6b3c4d56380a249"><span offset-key="ff838de92c774abeb6b3c4d56380a249:0"> return (</span></span>

3

<span key="f0273ed710864e46904e8bc6ae532fe1"><span offset-key="f0273ed710864e46904e8bc6ae532fe1:0"> &lt;FancyBorder color="blue"></span></span>

4

<span key="5b1302acea7c4ad3894069dd5bdcda65"><span offset-key="5b1302acea7c4ad3894069dd5bdcda65:0"> &lt;h1 className="Dialog-title"> Welcome &lt;/h1> &lt;p className="Dialog-message"> Thank you for visiting our spacecraft! &lt;/p> &lt;/FancyBorder></span></span>

5

<span key="4c89ba3727244748bd9f60f256202aec"><span offset-key="4c89ba3727244748bd9f60f256202aec:0"> );</span></span>

6

<span key="2cbe1c58335f47ce8a6e5e0013afbf84"><span offset-key="2cbe1c58335f47ce8a6e5e0013afbf84:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="ebf6030301d342e69d54ace58f2db449"><span offset-key="ebf6030301d342e69d54ace58f2db449:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://codepen.io/gaearon/pen/ozqNOV?editors=0010" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="49d5e75f8e144e088404077888811ebc" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-52850_259-52851-237__"><span data-key="c62503d98a1942fca05aeb9177550f0b"><strong>Try it on CodePen</strong></span></span></a><span key="06835b66667541c286582fd84b7bcc33"><span offset-key="06835b66667541c286582fd84b7bcc33:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53"><span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:0">Anything inside the </span>`<FancyBorder>`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:2"> JSX tag gets passed into the </span>`FancyBorder`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:4"> component as a </span>`children`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:6"> prop. Since </span>`FancyBorder`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:8"> renders </span>`{props.children}`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:10"> inside a </span>`<div>`<span offset-key="e25d625f54a74fb3ba86a01e4fce5d53:12">, the passed elements appear in the final output.</span></span>

<span key="1c066e1cfdb54b2085bea9275d024d97"><span offset-key="1c066e1cfdb54b2085bea9275d024d97:0">While this is less common, sometimes you might need multiple “holes” in a component. In such cases you may come up with your own convention instead of using </span>`children`<span offset-key="1c066e1cfdb54b2085bea9275d024d97:2">:</span></span>

1

<span key="edca0f8f688f4006ac7dc5ec9b6e1006"><span offset-key="edca0f8f688f4006ac7dc5ec9b6e1006:0">function SplitPane(props) {</span></span>

2

<span key="92182b5fd55a4fce833de3904f68beb1"><span offset-key="92182b5fd55a4fce833de3904f68beb1:0"> return (</span></span>

3

<span key="1efac63f586e48abb87178f4c5f59cf7"><span offset-key="1efac63f586e48abb87178f4c5f59cf7:0"> &lt;div className="SplitPane"></span></span>

4

<span key="df1e7122cca04ee78003e2dd7956ca9f"><span offset-key="df1e7122cca04ee78003e2dd7956ca9f:0"> &lt;div className="SplitPane-left"></span></span>

5

<span key="345a79af11af4072864445863a0c9675"><span offset-key="345a79af11af4072864445863a0c9675:0"> {props.left} &lt;/div></span></span>

6

<span key="3932bc5924994b95976447b871b598eb"><span offset-key="3932bc5924994b95976447b871b598eb:0"> &lt;div className="SplitPane-right"></span></span>

7

<span key="a51ec90078764a919ebbb780d909e854"><span offset-key="a51ec90078764a919ebbb780d909e854:0"> {props.right} &lt;/div></span></span>

8

<span key="3fd429c6b9d442ca9ff2a39c388cd7a5"><span offset-key="3fd429c6b9d442ca9ff2a39c388cd7a5:0"> &lt;/div></span></span>

9

<span key="3137c440304345d1b1dd519311daf35d"><span offset-key="3137c440304345d1b1dd519311daf35d:0"> );</span></span>

10

<span key="e4da7442126b4560af67fc373105bcc4"><span offset-key="e4da7442126b4560af67fc373105bcc4:0">}</span></span>

11

<span key="963deb1bf76e451fa731e71469a3085d"><span offset-key="963deb1bf76e451fa731e71469a3085d:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

12

<span key="6effad9efeea4b80927afbda818a7851"><span offset-key="6effad9efeea4b80927afbda818a7851:0">function App() {</span></span>

13

<span key="5007a49fe2df4d5fad4a96de16125a80"><span offset-key="5007a49fe2df4d5fad4a96de16125a80:0"> return (</span></span>

14

<span key="ba56878979244b9894a167e63f3ef1f4"><span offset-key="ba56878979244b9894a167e63f3ef1f4:0"> &lt;SplitPane</span></span>

15

<span key="7a32fb217e5f48b1a5f1511abcdb5e24"><span offset-key="7a32fb217e5f48b1a5f1511abcdb5e24:0"> left={</span></span>

16

<span key="4cf3c7f0df084edaa9634de4f4ad59cd"><span offset-key="4cf3c7f0df084edaa9634de4f4ad59cd:0"> &lt;Contacts /> }</span></span>

17

<span key="3d939a9c563b4591bb4f8727d20dcf85"><span offset-key="3d939a9c563b4591bb4f8727d20dcf85:0"> right={</span></span>

18

<span key="5803f0e19f644ef0ae3939df7dc02f07"><span offset-key="5803f0e19f644ef0ae3939df7dc02f07:0"> &lt;Chat /> } /></span></span>

19

<span key="bd0bbf6b7b554991b28b6f6acc8d6b80"><span offset-key="bd0bbf6b7b554991b28b6f6acc8d6b80:0"> );</span></span>

20

<span key="7caa3dd939b6499c97ec9ac91e4e8e7c"><span offset-key="7caa3dd939b6499c97ec9ac91e4e8e7c:0">}</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7 r-1vzi8xi" />

Copied!

<span key="01a3fc5d592c4b2cbd6c1e533a5ee19b"><span offset-key="01a3fc5d592c4b2cbd6c1e533a5ee19b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://codepen.io/gaearon/pen/gwZOJp?editors=0010" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ef01b46f95d847bfac15247aaa1aa2ad" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-52850_259-52851-237__"><span data-key="76605d8600ac4a26bbef52bc44b77b92"><strong>Try it on CodePen</strong></span></span></a><span key="e87472531e7c48df8223c8b9cc2fbc9a"><span offset-key="e87472531e7c48df8223c8b9cc2fbc9a:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="3100e3cbf0bf408ca6c351e6ca76da80">**<span slate-zero-width="n">​</span>**</span>

<span key="ad721dfb23064168b28b75a0a7df997e"><span offset-key="ad721dfb23064168b28b75a0a7df997e:0">React elements like </span>`<Contacts />`<span offset-key="ad721dfb23064168b28b75a0a7df997e:2"> and </span>`<Chat />`<span offset-key="ad721dfb23064168b28b75a0a7df997e:4"> are just objects, so you can pass them as props like any other data. This approach may remind you of “slots” in other libraries but there are no limitations on what you can pass as props in React.</span></span>

# 

<span key="4e9daee5614547b9a0a3ef01fc44027a"><span offset-key="4e9daee5614547b9a0a3ef01fc44027a:0">Specialization</span></span>

<span key="383eaa7559ee46d1be8e143a8aa731b2"><span offset-key="383eaa7559ee46d1be8e143a8aa731b2:0">Sometimes we think about components as being “special cases” of other components. For example, we might say that a </span>`WelcomeDialog`<span offset-key="383eaa7559ee46d1be8e143a8aa731b2:2"> is a special case of </span>`Dialog`<span offset-key="383eaa7559ee46d1be8e143a8aa731b2:4">.</span></span>

<span key="0bb39fa2d81b4b7b9ef3f39d96e3082e"><span offset-key="0bb39fa2d81b4b7b9ef3f39d96e3082e:0">In React, this is also achieved by composition, where a more “specific” component renders a more “generic” one and configures it with props:</span></span>

1

<span key="e094f651959845a5ac2bb6b93585e091"><span offset-key="e094f651959845a5ac2bb6b93585e091:0">function Dialog(props) {</span></span>

2

<span key="dc4e4cf542474ffea758e41a0489cc58"><span offset-key="dc4e4cf542474ffea758e41a0489cc58:0"> return (</span></span>

3

<span key="eaa1f9bda50641d2a4aed2419f432a3b"><span offset-key="eaa1f9bda50641d2a4aed2419f432a3b:0"> &lt;FancyBorder color="blue"></span></span>

4

<span key="b7a00f27b790417e81ac547dfb18da22"><span offset-key="b7a00f27b790417e81ac547dfb18da22:0"> &lt;h1 className="Dialog-title"></span></span>

5

<span key="065cf7c72bf24e13a32475ff6aa8be29"><span offset-key="065cf7c72bf24e13a32475ff6aa8be29:0"> {props.title} &lt;/h1></span></span>

6

<span key="7ac9c88021bf434eb341f8c55e1b890e"><span offset-key="7ac9c88021bf434eb341f8c55e1b890e:0"> &lt;p className="Dialog-message"></span></span>

7

<span key="dd17a07fe7164dc69e8bc8f091e5e74c"><span offset-key="dd17a07fe7164dc69e8bc8f091e5e74c:0"> {props.message} &lt;/p></span></span>

8

<span key="cd87ce3c3e3a401cbfa0e78d22fd1d9e"><span offset-key="cd87ce3c3e3a401cbfa0e78d22fd1d9e:0"> &lt;/FancyBorder></span></span>

9

<span key="5651889d384c4c288c64f8135832d365"><span offset-key="5651889d384c4c288c64f8135832d365:0"> );</span></span>

10

<span key="85f422c5c143434fb43e589cc6b8ad67"><span offset-key="85f422c5c143434fb43e589cc6b8ad67:0">}</span></span>

11

<span key="9059c527af444e0c9a758b7fc126a281"><span offset-key="9059c527af444e0c9a758b7fc126a281:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

12

<span key="c5b532ebbeda47ac8137b0f0acf6f827"><span offset-key="c5b532ebbeda47ac8137b0f0acf6f827:0">function WelcomeDialog() {</span></span>

13

<span key="c8c900cf281047fea214f1de886b42af"><span offset-key="c8c900cf281047fea214f1de886b42af:0"> return (</span></span>

14

<span key="f8e7db11ea3f451b8964f46421f81061"><span offset-key="f8e7db11ea3f451b8964f46421f81061:0"> &lt;Dialog title="Welcome" message="Thank you for visiting our spacecraft!" /> );</span></span>

15

<span key="dad5b6694ae3446e90f137d5abacf2c5"><span offset-key="dad5b6694ae3446e90f137d5abacf2c5:0">}</span></span>

<span key="1ea171ab23a64f3fa5b782b6ea4f2e08"><span offset-key="1ea171ab23a64f3fa5b782b6ea4f2e08:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://codepen.io/gaearon/pen/kkEaOZ?editors=0010" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="55334980e24745b9afe810efb4fb9385" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-52850_259-52851-237__"><span data-key="a2a61347b0544cba86a40e1febc7a1a3"><strong>Try it on CodePen</strong></span></span></a><span key="4f24ae32284843308eb095334ff9b5ce"><span offset-key="4f24ae32284843308eb095334ff9b5ce:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="2d2bec0f85ef4945a6974830802fba18"><span offset-key="2d2bec0f85ef4945a6974830802fba18:0">Composition works equally well for components defined as classes:</span></span>

1

<span key="05fab6aac3ea455e82f6cc25089f578c"><span offset-key="05fab6aac3ea455e82f6cc25089f578c:0">function Dialog(props) {</span></span>

2

<span key="a44ab9afff4742639635b60af536326f"><span offset-key="a44ab9afff4742639635b60af536326f:0"> return (</span></span>

3

<span key="964db6aa6bcb471db151f687f82a0d06"><span offset-key="964db6aa6bcb471db151f687f82a0d06:0"> &lt;FancyBorder color="blue"></span></span>

4

<span key="63975fcd9e274eaf82e8631cc981d306"><span offset-key="63975fcd9e274eaf82e8631cc981d306:0"> &lt;h1 className="Dialog-title"></span></span>

5

<span key="482c1053c0864a2cafdc0a7cef053a5f"><span offset-key="482c1053c0864a2cafdc0a7cef053a5f:0"> {props.title}</span></span>

6

<span key="ee2341aa91534e3c80357bce76db63a2"><span offset-key="ee2341aa91534e3c80357bce76db63a2:0"> &lt;/h1></span></span>

7

<span key="19c019d26a644103ba964badb8c61052"><span offset-key="19c019d26a644103ba964badb8c61052:0"> &lt;p className="Dialog-message"></span></span>

8

<span key="a589fc71088f4754adff5f32dcd90955"><span offset-key="a589fc71088f4754adff5f32dcd90955:0"> {props.message}</span></span>

9

<span key="daaa0555ff624bf0aa5e39e05ece8de1"><span offset-key="daaa0555ff624bf0aa5e39e05ece8de1:0"> &lt;/p></span></span>

10

<span key="b210e6977c0c49f6b4950523e1d61e3d"><span offset-key="b210e6977c0c49f6b4950523e1d61e3d:0"> {props.children} &lt;/FancyBorder></span></span>

11

<span key="124841a1a4004eeb83295ec20d29ec6e"><span offset-key="124841a1a4004eeb83295ec20d29ec6e:0"> );</span></span>

12

<span key="fd735f3268ca4d859e1d4995e63a432f"><span offset-key="fd735f3268ca4d859e1d4995e63a432f:0">}</span></span>

13

<span key="955ce0f7b56246c385e006d9f0919d15"><span offset-key="955ce0f7b56246c385e006d9f0919d15:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

14

<span key="617625c8b53d41a6938cab0fb1241c92"><span offset-key="617625c8b53d41a6938cab0fb1241c92:0">class SignUpDialog extends React.Component {</span></span>

15

<span key="a5cf5f0de31347d9af34609be762536f"><span offset-key="a5cf5f0de31347d9af34609be762536f:0"> constructor(props) {</span></span>

16

<span key="cd6c13a3a1d94585ab82deae64ffab9a"><span offset-key="cd6c13a3a1d94585ab82deae64ffab9a:0"> super(props);</span></span>

17

<span key="66e98917863f43fea9a1cca0f61bd13d"><span offset-key="66e98917863f43fea9a1cca0f61bd13d:0"> this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this);</span></span>

18

<span key="bf35f275f0d5420db9f395c31eaaef1e"><span offset-key="bf35f275f0d5420db9f395c31eaaef1e:0"> this.handleSignUp = this.handleSignUp.bind(this);</span></span>

19

<span key="446e330b13f14b17b63b85e3a0c9da0c"><span offset-key="446e330b13f14b17b63b85e3a0c9da0c:0"> this.state = {login: ''};</span></span>

20

<span key="567749d217964133867c0da7bd2b8e41"><span offset-key="567749d217964133867c0da7bd2b8e41:0"> }</span></span>

21

<span key="9b63db8ca23549968e0afb3cccf9d4b7"><span offset-key="9b63db8ca23549968e0afb3cccf9d4b7:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

22

<span key="5a340ed958134f29a0d5a163c8257568"><span offset-key="5a340ed958134f29a0d5a163c8257568:0"> render() {</span></span>

23

<span key="fc73f22f8b3b48d09add9095ddccb273"><span offset-key="fc73f22f8b3b48d09add9095ddccb273:0"> return (</span></span>

24

<span key="7f95333490684d1aa17c31bc26c82fd7"><span offset-key="7f95333490684d1aa17c31bc26c82fd7:0"> &lt;Dialog title="Mars Exploration Program"</span></span>

25

<span key="7a875ac51ba84a0a8ec424111ddea685"><span offset-key="7a875ac51ba84a0a8ec424111ddea685:0"> message="How should we refer to you?"></span></span>

26

<span key="b7f5c69460de4b1b9012c7860d0039e5"><span offset-key="b7f5c69460de4b1b9012c7860d0039e5:0"> &lt;input value={this.state.login} onChange={this.handleChange} /> &lt;button onClick={this.handleSignUp}> Sign Me Up! &lt;/button> &lt;/Dialog></span></span>

27

<span key="d54201b49cbf46398045be65d3c961e7"><span offset-key="d54201b49cbf46398045be65d3c961e7:0"> );</span></span>

28

<span key="10f5580bc1a84ac688b7fd6f5e7b58eb"><span offset-key="10f5580bc1a84ac688b7fd6f5e7b58eb:0"> }</span></span>

29

<span key="061f82ad0c6c4bafa32d780514d50697"><span offset-key="061f82ad0c6c4bafa32d780514d50697:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

30

<span key="994c02ac46e74593bf194561378b80d4"><span offset-key="994c02ac46e74593bf194561378b80d4:0"> handleChange(e) {</span></span>

31

<span key="6dd635feef634ee8b6948cb0479abe0b"><span offset-key="6dd635feef634ee8b6948cb0479abe0b:0"> this.setState({login: e.target.value});</span></span>

32

<span key="56a08c28b08d4b4194cde85dedb288c0"><span offset-key="56a08c28b08d4b4194cde85dedb288c0:0"> }</span></span>

33

<span key="2284c4cb91944f7ca989fa82f1c7f7dd"><span offset-key="2284c4cb91944f7ca989fa82f1c7f7dd:0"><span slate-zero-width="n">​</span></span></span>

34

<span key="386cbd297693473486ddef3fdafbc2e9"><span offset-key="386cbd297693473486ddef3fdafbc2e9:0"> handleSignUp() {</span></span>

35

<span key="3428ffae23ec4851b17fce2653a501f7"><span offset-key="3428ffae23ec4851b17fce2653a501f7:0"> alert(\`Welcome aboard, ${this.state.login}!\`);</span></span>

36

<span key="e468f62e174c4be0ba17ec53915a3a84"><span offset-key="e468f62e174c4be0ba17ec53915a3a84:0"> }</span></span>

<span key="7493ddc94bce40e3a99affaf1bf34346"><span offset-key="7493ddc94bce40e3a99affaf1bf34346:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://codepen.io/gaearon/pen/gwZbYa?editors=0010" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b322d1be1ff84f2bba38338bdd76962f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-52850_259-52851-237__"><span data-key="040af4707997447daa25f13a76d09949"><strong>Try it on CodePen</strong></span></span></a><span key="d0d1822a44bf4aff803d27fa1963282f"><span offset-key="d0d1822a44bf4aff803d27fa1963282f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

# 

<span key="677339727d1842ae9abcb051b0bf8722"><span offset-key="677339727d1842ae9abcb051b0bf8722:0">So What About Inheritance?</span></span>

<span key="82eafce13e1d4905ba4a7a761ac54f1f"><span offset-key="82eafce13e1d4905ba4a7a761ac54f1f:0">At Facebook, we use React in thousands of components, and we haven’t found any use cases where we would recommend creating component inheritance hierarchies.</span></span>

<span key="b9eac3609ac84a89882158103c835883"><span offset-key="b9eac3609ac84a89882158103c835883:0">Props and composition give you all the flexibility you need to customize a component’s look and behavior in an explicit and safe way. Remember that components may accept arbitrary props, including primitive values, React elements, or functions.</span></span>

<span key="1740f92c27074c3c8e87856c60e3e455"><span offset-key="1740f92c27074c3c8e87856c60e3e455:0">If you want to reuse non-UI functionality between components, we suggest extracting it into a separate JavaScript module. The components may import it and use that function, object, or a class, without extending it.</span></span>

<a href="untitled-1.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-14lw9ot r-190qawg r-z2wwpe r-rs99b7 r-4dj0k7 r-1loqt21 r-1quu1zo r-1ro0kt6 r-18u37iz r-16y2uox r-1wbh5a2 r-nsbfu8 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1rasi3h r-1472mwg r-1vzi8xi r-lrsllp" />

So What About Inheritance?
